items.name: The Fulcrum
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Area of Effect per 4% Quality
implicitMods: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: 178% increased Physical Damage
48% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
15% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
33% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Elemental Ailments you inflict are Reflected to you
Elemental Damage with Hits is Lucky while you are Shocked
Damage Penetrates 9% Elemental Resistances while you are Chilled
Gain 38% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element while you are Ignited
flavourText: To stand at the confluence of the elements,
the master must achieve perfect balance.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.

You and nearby allies gain 2051 additional Armour

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports hex curse skills, turning them into auras that will apply their effect to all enemies in an area around you.

Supported Curse Skills apply their Curses as Auras
Supported Curse Skills also count as Aura Skills
Using Supported Skills is Instant
25% less Effect of Supported Curses
106% increased Area of Effect of Supported Curse Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
